DOC.brief_title: Transvaginal Ultrasound Cervical Length Measurements Twin Gestations
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial determine whether difference rate preterm birth among woman twin pregnancy whose clinician aware transvaginal ultrasound cervical length measurement compare manage without information . The study group transvaginal cervical length ultrasound monthly 16-28 week manage standard algorithm activity restriction cerclage depend cervical length . The control group digital cervical exam routine transvaginal cervical length ultrasound utilized . The primary outcome mean length gestation . Secondary outcome include percentage delivery < 35 week , maternal neonatal outcome .
